effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.

short_effect.black-white: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.

flavor_text.black-white: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.
